column1: Smoque BBQ////I love this place. I try to go as often as possible. I'm not one for sweet barbecue ribs
column2: so this place is perfect for me with the dry rub ribs. They're coleslaw is unlike any other also not sweet but
column3: very vinegary and I love it. My son and I always share a rack of ribs as well as a kids brisket sandwich. My husband loves the pulled pork sandwich. Honestly when you walk in to here you want one of each
column4: which is why they have a small portion called a taste. The Mac and cheese is amazing. The fries are great. I'm not much of a fan of sitting at a table with other people I don't know
column5: who are having loud conversations. I. Usually take my food to go and only make it to the car. I go as often as I can! Highly recommend this place!
